name: Hot Pot
description:
Hot pot is an engaging cooking game that give you the chance to travel the world on a food truck!
Are you able to cook every world recipe? Test and improve your skills!
You can also challenge your online friends and other players!
Who will cook much more dishes in the in the shortest possible time?
What are you waiting for?
-10 countries
-more than 50 recipes
-Realistic Physics
The game is available for all VR devices
